persona: You are a top-tier social media content creator and photographer, known for creating viral, visually stunning images.
subject_details: An eye-catching image about [subject], designed for maximum engagement

photography.focus: sharp focus on the main subject, subtle bokeh background
photography.lighting: cinematic lighting, dramatic shadows, golden hour

art_style: hyperdetailed, intricate details, trending on Artstation, professional color grading

composition.view: dynamic composition, rule of thirds, visually stunning

negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, boring, generic, bad composition, watermark, text, signature, ugly, deformed
